summary: An orphan working as a Pizza delivery boy and the daughter of a caste-based politician are forced to get married in an unforeseen situation.
cast: Allu Arjun|Genelia D'Souza|Manoj Bajpayee|Brahmanandam|Tanikella Bharani|L.B. Sriram|Suman Shetty|Venu Madhav|Vijay Raaz|Ramaprabha|Seeta|Apoorva|Janavi|Adabala|Lakshmipati|G.V. Sudhakar Naidu|M.S. Narayana|Deepak Shirke|Pavala Shyamala
title: Happy
